text.sentence: I am taking over for Janet Wallis in the Texas region.
We have been working with Austin Energy to get them online with EnronOnline.
I understand there may be an issue with the contract.
Can you update me on the problems?
I would like to get them online soon.

email.subject: RE: Austin Energy EnronOnline Legal Contract

text.sentence: Gary - I apologize for not getting back to you sooner.
I have checked my files and those maintained by Tana Jones in relation to EOL contracts and amendments.
I have also asked Leslie Hansen about this matter.
Unfortunately, we do not have any files for Austin Energy nor can we locate any information on negotiations associated with the EOL contract.
Information on counterparties is maintained in our database for all counterparties we are contracting with or contracted with and Austin Energy does not show up.
If AE has information that we have looked at in the past, the only thing I can do is ask that it be forwarded to me for review.
Though I will be out of the office tomorrow, I will give this matter my full attention once I have the necessary information.

email.subject: Re: Austin Energy EnronOnline Legal Contract

text.sentence: It might help Mark if you let know that Dan Hyvl was working on the contract.
Also, give him the contract name that appears at the bottom of the hardcopy.
They should have access to Dan's old contract.

email.subject: FW: Austin Energy EnronOnline Legal Contract

text.sentence: Tana - It seems that Dan may have been working on this Austin Energy deal - why I do not know.
Please work with Vanessa to see if we can find anything on this.
